games.title: Mafia: The Old Country
games.description: Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily.

games.title: Civilization VII
games.description: Build an empire to stand the test of time in the next evolution of the legendary strategy game.

games.title: Monster Hunter Wilds
games.description: The next evolution of the Monster Hunter series, featuring vast open environments and dynamic weather systems.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows
games.description: Experience feudal Japan through the eyes of a shinobi assassin and a legendary samurai.

games.title: Grand Theft Auto VI
games.description: The next installment in the Grand Theft Auto series, featuring dual protagonists in Vice City.

games.title: College Football 26
games.description: The latest installment in the college football simulation series.

games.title: Tales of the Shire: A Lord of the Rings Game
games.description: A cozy hobbit life simulation game set in the Lord of the Rings universe.

games.title: Borderlands 4
games.description: The next installment in the Borderlands looter-shooter series.

games.title: Ready or Not
games.description: A tactical first-person shooter inspired by modern day swat operations.

games.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4
games.description: The next remasters in the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series.
